metadata.title: Historical NDVI of Sea Study Area 1985-90

creators.name: U.S. Geological Survey (USGS), Biological Resources Division, Alaska Science Center (ASC), National Biological Service

metadata.description: Data Type: Remotely Sensed Data;   Historical primary productivity measurements for the terrestrial portion of the sea study area 1985-1990. A data set of AVHRR derived Normalized Difference Vegetation Indices (NDVI) for the SEA study area. This project is still in progress. Our aim is to develop an annual growing season (May-September) time series of NDVI for 1985-1996.
